author: Caitlin O'Kane
title: Can cats and dogs catch coronavirus?
description: A new study looked at several animal species and found some are more susceptible than others – but vets don't want you to worry.
content: There are still many unanswered questions about the novel coronavirus, but this week, new and surprising information about the transmission of the virus was revealed: A tiger at the Bronx Zoo tested positive — and health officials say she caught it from a zoo… [+5908 chars]
